text:
142
TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
MEMORANDUM REGARDING DELEGATED LEGISLATION
Clauses: 1(3), 4, 6, 8, 16, 18, 33, 54, 55 and 56 of the Bill authorise, the Government, the Syndicate, Academic Council, and other authorities of the University to prescribe the manner and the method of giving effect to certain provisions of the proposed Act, when enacted and brought into operation, by issuing suitable notifications, statutes, ordinances or regulations, as the case may be.
2. The powers delegated are normal and not of an exceptional character.
DR. K. PONMUDY,
Minister for Higher Education.
M. SELVARAJ, Secretary.
